data.name: Hazard Ops: Survival Pack
data.detailed_description:
Brutal carnage and hard-hitting action that will teach even veteran players the meaning of fear: That’s the essence of Hazard Ops. If you want to survive the slaughter, you’ll need more than just a solid backbone.

Every mission and every battle is about your survival. We’ve got a pack that can save your skin, even in the toughest scenarios. Whether you take out whole squads with the camo-covered MG or go one-on-one with the punishing SMG, both of these bad boys will get the job done. And if all else fails, the included turrets and Corpse Shredder grenades will…shred corpses – just like it says on the package!

By the way: This pack also comes with 30 days of VIP access (+30% XP and Coins, VIP store access, and several buffs).

Weapons & Mods

  • MP5-ZK (permanent)
  • M249-ZK (7 Tage)
  • Corpse Shredder (7 days)
  • Big Time Assault WA2000 Box
  • SMG Reflex Scope (7 days)
  • SMG High-Capacity Mag (7 days)

Costumes

  • Soldier of Fortune (M) (permanent) – freebie
  • Soldier of Fortune (F) (permanent) – freebie

Consumables

  • VIP Access (30 days)
  • 5x Grenade Turret
  • 5x Revive Token
  • 1x Key Card
  • 1x Difficulty Unlock

Gear up for survival, and aim for the head!

data.short_description: In Hazard Ops, survival is your top priority every second. And we have just the thing for that. This pack can save your skin in any scenario. From long-range to close combat, guns to grenades, these bad boys will get the job done.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel i-Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
